description: Nothing goes better with a fragrant Indian curry than fluffy garlic naan. Try our healthier version and enjoy fast-food flavours at home.
keywords: Flatbread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Jun 2021,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Autumn,Peanut free
name: Healthier Garlic Naan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.75 cup selfraising flour (plus extra for dusting)
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place yoghurt and flour in a large bowl. Using a flatbladed knife, stir until a sticky dough forms. Turn out onto a lightly floured surface. Knead gently until just smooth. Wrap dough in baking paper and set aside for 20 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine oil and garlic in a small jug. Season with pepper.
Divide dough into 4 even portions. Roll each portion into a ball. Using a lightly floured rolling pin, roll out dough to a 1cmthick oval.

Heat a large, nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Working in batches, cook 2 naan at a time for 2 minutes on each side or until slightly puffed and golden brown. Brush one side with a little garlic mixture. Turn naan, garlic-side down, and cook for 15 seconds or until fragrant. Serve with Healthier chicken curry.
